id.description: Local identifier of the result resource

command@id.description: Local identifier of the command that this result is associated to

inline.description: Inline data encoded according to the control stream result schema

observation@link.description: Link to an observation resulting from the execution of the command

observationSet@link.description: Link to a set of observations resulting from the execution of the command

datastream@link.description: Link to a datastream containing observations resulting from the execution of the command

resultTime.description: Time range during which the resulting observations were generated (If not provided, the entire datastream is assumed to be the result)

oneOf.title: Link to a set of observations
